name: Webcam Capture Tool
description: Captures single image from local webcam using OpenCV. Returns Base64-encoded PNG/JPEG. Requires camera access.
author: Shinkai

cameraIndex.description: Camera device index (0=default/built-in, 1+=external). Must be connected and accessible

format.description: Output image format: png (lossless) or jpeg (compressed). Default: png

width.description: Desired image width in pixels. May be adjusted to match camera capabilities. Default: 640

height.description: Desired image height in pixels. May be adjusted to match camera capabilities. Default: 480

imageBase64.description: Base64-encoded image data in specified format (png/jpeg). Can be decoded to binary

width.description: Final image width in pixels. May differ from requested if camera has constraints

height.description: Final image height in pixels. May differ from requested if camera has constraints
